title: Kamabara, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ; upper center
description: snowy mountain village scene at night; three travelers trudging through snow; two at R with straw and fabric cloaks heading uphill; one with half-open umbrella over head walks downhill
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
